resources.string: This app is designed to pin a quick and simple memo on your home screen.

How to use:
 0.Long press on your home screen.
 1.Select WIDGETS on the bottom.
 2.Scroll down till you find the app icon.
 3.Long press the icon to pin it on the home screen.
 4.An configuration interface would show up.
 5.Set a title, content, icon and color for the memo.
 6.Click the button DONE when you finish.
 7.To remove the memo, drag it to the REMOVE area.
 8.To resize it, long click to see the adjustable frame
